sys_element_mapping.value: NeedIt Task {{2f2bb231-6fff-4b88-99e7-dc27b6eaa8ae.item.number}} was automatically closed because its Due date of {{2f2bb231-6fff-4b88-99e7-dc27b6eaa8ae.item.due_date}} was older than the autoCloseOverdue settings of {{c13f3b81-2a5b-4b08-9668-a6cea91ee8de.property_value}} days.
